Silence::

She had heard the blustery bot below her.  Another was close by, per
her scanners.  She could tell they were Maximals, so she did not see
any harm in revealing herself to them.  She swooped down, transformed
into bot mode and landed on her two feet.  She stood only 4 feet tall,
coming up to Wolfblade's shoulders.  Her white and gold skin shined
glittered in the varying light play from the forest. She looked up at
Wolfblade. Her large optics still gave her an owl quality even though
she was in bot mode. "Salutations."

WOlfblade::
"Saluwhat?"

Silence::
"Salutations. Greetings. Hello. Gondrack. Kwitchateekee. Ah, Hi
there." She said with a slight tremble in her voice. Some of her
systems were still sorting themselves out from the long slumber. 

Wolfblade::
"Lady, I only understood two to three words you just said. But since
you said them, Hello yourself. I'm Wolfblade, from the Maximal base.
We got your signal and came to get you. Glad to see we made it before
the Predacons did."

Silence::
"Predacons still thrive then? I was hoping the confict would have been
resolved by now. But then again, preds are very resilliant bots."

Wolfblade::
"Yeah, and you can't get rid of them either." she said with a chuckle.
She was a warrior. Fancy words never did her fit for her. She looked
at Silence and knew she wouldn't stand a chance in hand to hand
combat. Really petite body frame, small form, probably has that ultra
light weight transmetal as well. But a recon bot, now she found
herself thinking of attack patterns and ways to deal with Unicron and
the Preds. She shook her head to regain focus. She turned and looked
for Malice. It was then a slight twinge of jealousy reared it's head.
Another femmebot to contend with. OH well, she knew what she had to
do, so it didn't make a difference really.
